price: Bizaba ari ingabire ziturutse kwa Nyagasani wawe! Iyo ni yo izaba ari intsinzi ihambaye!
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbika dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
